sentences.en: By the early 1980s, the power station had outlived its purpose.
sentences.cn: 这座电站到20世纪80年代初就已经失去作用了。

sentences.en: Concrete purpose-built resorts are littered across the mountainsides.
sentences.cn: 山坡上到处都是专门建造的水泥度假屋。

sentences.en: His hard sinewy body advertised his ruthlessness of purpose.
sentences.cn: 他健硕的身体使他显得意志尤为坚强。

sentences.en: His purpose was to make a profit by improving the company's performance.
sentences.cn: 他的目标是通过提高公司的业绩来实现盈利。

sentences.en: Nick had no particular purpose in mind when he started.
sentences.cn: 尼克开始的时候头脑中并没有明确的目标。

sentences.en: One has to ask oneself what the purpose of the exercise is.
sentences.cn: 大家必须问一问自己，这个锻炼的目的是什么。

sentences.en: The company has recently moved into a new purpose-built factory.
sentences.cn: 该公司最近搬进了一家专门建造的新工厂。

sentences.en: The purpose of the occasion was to raise money for medical supplies.
sentences.cn: 此次活动的目的是为医疗用品筹款。

sentences.en: The purpose of the visit was to navigate into an ice-filled fiord.
sentences.cn: 这次出行是为了能驶入冰雪覆盖的峡湾。

sentences.en: The purpose of this meeting is to elect a new chairman.
sentences.cn: 这次会议的目的是选出一位新主席。

sentences.en: The teachers are enthusiastic and have a sense of purpose.
sentences.cn: 教师们很热情并且很有决心。

sentences.en: They felt that all the regularities in nature have a purpose.
sentences.cn: 他们感到自然界一切有规律的事物均有目的性.

sentences.en: They had shown a commitment and seriousness of purpose.
sentences.cn: 他们已经立下承诺，并表达了想要实现目标的诚意。

sentences.en: Use all-purpose flour if you cannot find pastry flour.
sentences.cn: 如果找不到面点专用粉，可以用通用面粉。

sentences.en: Was it an accident or did David do it on purpose?
sentences.cn: 是意外还是戴维故意所为？

sentences.en: We spoke to little purpose — his mind was clearly made up already.
sentences.cn: 我们说的话几乎不起作用,他显然已下定决心了.

sentences.en: What'simpressed me has been his considerable firmness of purpose.
sentences.cn: 令我印象深刻的是他对目标的坚定不移。

sentences.en: you may have heard something from them which is to the purpose.
sentences.cn: 你或许已从他们那儿听到了一些有关的事情。

words.tran_cn: 无目的的；无益的；缺乏决心的

phrases.phrase: to little purpose 或 to no purpose
phrases.tran_cn: 几乎徒劳的，少有成效地
无结果地，无成效地，徒劳地
与本题有关的，得要领的，合适的；有用的

trans.tran_cn: 意图，计划，情势需要，重要意义，意志
trans.tran_en: the purpose of something is what it is intended to achieve
